name: Poison S. Brew
skill: A high/very high chance of inflicting Virulent Poison on all enemies.
ability: Moderately increases all allies' Crit DMG.

additional_data.description: A rare spirit said to produce rice wine with the mysterious ability to weaken demons. Rumor has it the sake itself isn't what's magical, so much as the magic with which this skillful vintner imbues the mix. She's said to be particularly effective at expunging spells. Oh, and the "S" in her name stands for "sake."
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Obtained after clearing Chapter 5.
◦ Available in Jewel Summon after clearing Chapter 5.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ She is old friends with Sola. Sola calls her 'Jin-chan (Divine-chan)' as a nickname.

main: "What am I drinking, you ask? Why, that'd be telling."
skill: "I've prepared a lavish treat, just for you!"
summon: "Well, well... So you need my help, is that it?"
limit_break: "It's like I've had a drink or two... but I really haven't!"
